# JSONEncoder.DateEncodingStrategy.secondsSince1970

**Case**

The strategy that encodes dates in terms of seconds since midnight UTC on January 1, 1970.

## Declaration

```swift
case secondsSince1970
```

## Epoch Formats

- **JSONEncoder.DateEncodingStrategy.millisecondsSince1970**: The strategy that encodes dates in terms of milliseconds since midnight UTC on January 1, 1970.
